hu.vadasz.peter.knockmessenger.DataPersister.Managers

Class MessageDataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.vadasz.peter.knockmessenger.DataPersister.Managers.MessageDataManager

  • public class MessageDataManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides cache and access to the messages.
